stanza.line: Thy gift thy tables are within my brainbrain
Which shall above that idle rank remainremain
Beyond all date even to eternityeternity
Or at the least so long as brain and heartheart
Have faculty by nature to subsistsubsist
Till each to razed oblivion yield his partpart
Of thee thy record never can be missedmissed
That poor retention could not so much holdhold
Nor need I tallies thy dear love to scorescore
Therefore to give them from me was I boldbold
To trust those tables that receive thee moremore
To keep an adjunct to remember theethee
Were to import forgetfulness in meme
